title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb (red portrait) w/Carolina Brights back PSA 1
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Ty Cobb (red portrait) w/Carolina Brights back PSA 1
posts.post_content:
I have the following card available FOR SALE or TRADE.

1909-11 T206 Ty Cobb (red portrait) with Carolina Brights back

Graded: PSA 1

Condition: Card has a sharp looking front.  Would be absolutely stunning if not for the paper loss on the back, thus resulting in the low grade.  

Price: SOLD Shipped and insured via USPS.

Payments accepted: Check or MO preferred.  Paypal will work to is sent as "gift".

If TRADING, I'm looking for:

-E94's to help me with my set.  Any color and I need most of them (I currently have 9 of 30 subjects).
-T216's (any player, any back)
-HOFers (especially Wagner/Cobb/Matty/Johnson/Young), or any scarce 19th Century/Tobacco/Caramel/Bakery cards.

If interested, email me at: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks for your consideration.

[IMG]http://i282.photobucket.com/albums/kk264/crazylocomerk3/My%2015/CobbDetroitPortraitRedPSA1CB.jpg[/IMG]
CARD HAS BEEN SOLD!!!!  Thank you.
